amendment.description: To increase investments in implementation of the National Fire Plan to benefit national forests, the environment, local communities and local economies.

vote.text: Amendment SA 328 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 328 proposed by Senator Nickles for Senator Wyden. (consideration: CR S4242-4243; text: CR S4242) To increase investments in implementation of the National Fire Plan to benefit national forests, the environment, local communities and local economies.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 328 proposed by Senator Nickles for Senator Wyden.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 328 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
